name: Cup-cake Mania Sweet candy Match 3 Maker Pop Game
name_original: Cup-cake Mania Sweet candy Match 3 Maker Pop Game
description:
Match your way the wonderful Cup-cake Mania in this magical puzzle adventure!

Most popular puzzle game is now available for you!

Join and Download the new flavors of our Match 3 game "Cup-cake Mania Sweet candy Match 3 Maker Pop Game" Try it now. Easy to learn but challenging to master!

This game gives you the most innovative matching experience in Yummy land that you’ve never had before! Bakery Jam Mania is a fun match-3 puzzle game for all ages which will delight you with interesting puzzle game!

GAME FEATURES INCLUDES:

New Cup-cake Match 3 Puzzle game
-MATCH and collect Cupcakes, Donuts and more delicious Pastries!

New Challenging Mode
-New challenging and fun game mode, special Gems and boosters. Variety Puzzle modes frequently illustrated in different challenging levels!

Explore Big Matches
-For explosive combos find big matches to create Sweet Cup-cake Spots and win huge bonuses. Complete different targets to win the level before you run out of moves!

Compete Against your Friends
-Compete against your friends for the top score in every level

Free Updates
-Play with FREE updates including new levels

Cup-cake Mania is the BEST puzzle adventure game on iPhone and iPad. Download it and start your yummy saga today!

Leave a review and rating to let us know what you think about this game. We would really appreciate your rating…
